Threading module¶

src.threading.calc_dist_matrix(query, template, dist_range)[source]¶

Calculate the matrix of distances of pair residues of the query sequence, using the coordinates of the template sequence: threading of the query on the template sequence. The distance calculation is optimized.

Parameters:
  • query (list of Residue) – List of residues of the query sequence
  • template (list of Residue) – List of residues of the template sequence
  • dist_range (list of int) – Range of distances in angströms. Distances within this range only are taken into account
Returns:

The distance matrix between pairs of residues of the

query sequence after being threaded on the template sequence.
Return type:

2D numpy matrix
src.threading.convert_dist_to_energy(dist_matrix, dist_position_dict, dope_df)[source]¶

Convert the distance between residues to energy values based on dope score table.

Parameters:
  • dist_matrix (numpy 2D array) – 2D matrix containing distances between pairs of residues of the query sequence threaded on the template.
  • dist_position_dict (Dictionary) – Dictionary containing as key a tuple of coord (i,j) describing the coords of residues associated (res1, res2) as values.
  • dope_df (panda DataFrame) – DataFrame (20x20) containing a list of 30 energy values for 30 interval of distances between 0.25 to 15 with a step of 0.50
Returns:

2D matrix containing energy between pairs of residues

of the query sequence threaded on the template.
Return type:

numpy 2D array
src.threading.display_matrix(matrix)[source]¶

Display the distance matrix in the terminal.

Parameters:matrix (numpy ndarray) – Matrix of shape (query_length * query_length) containing distances and gaps represented as “*”.
Returns:void
